config.drop_confirm.title: DropConfirm Settings
drop_confirm.confirmation: Press %s again to drop this item.
drop_confirm.confirmation.popup: Are you sure you want to drop your %s?
option.drop_confirm.confirmation_reset_d: The amount of time in seconds before the confirmation status is reset.
option.drop_confirm.play_sounds.descript: Whether DropConfirm should play sounds for various events.
option.drop_confirm.treat_as_whitelist.d: Whether the blacklist should be instead be treated as a whitelist.
option.drop_confirm.blacklisted_items.de: Items that should be ignored by DropConfirm.
option.drop_confirm.whitelisted_items.de: Items that should not be ignored by DropConfirm.
option.drop_confirm.confirmation_mode.de: Choose how/where item drop confirmations are displayed.
